description: initials of person who typed the dry aboveground mass data from the sample bag
initials of person who typed the fresh aboveground mass data from the sample bag
initials of person who weighed and recorded the fresh aboveground mass data onto the sample bag
initials of person who weighed and recorded the dry aboveground mass data onto the sample bag
recorded date for root harvesting? (year-month-day format)
recorded date for dry aboveground biomass (year-month-day format)
recorded date for fresh aboveground biomass (year-month-day format)
block number from a randomized block design (range: B1, B2, B3, B4, B5 - text characters)
genus-species code and individual number for that particular species (range: 1-20 - integers)
watering regime treatment: WD (1L once a  week); WW (1 L twice a week)
fresh aboveground biomass (in grams); weighed using a Mettler Toledo AL54 scale
dy aboveground biomass (in grams); weighed using a Mettler Toledo AL54 scale
sanity check: aboveground fresh biomass should be higher than aboveground dry biomass
